title: Minted Asparagus and Garden Pea Soup
ingredients: ['200g asparagus spears', '1 tbsp olive oil', '2 shallots, chopped', '175g potatoes, peeled and chopped', '140g frozen peas', '650ml vegetable stock, made with stock cubes', 'small sprig of fresh mint', '4 tbsp fromage frais', '40g toasted pine nuts']
